The Almanack of Naval Ravikant: A Guide to Wealth and Happiness

  • 本书重要说明
  • 前言
  • 艾瑞克的笔记
  • 纳瓦尔自己的话

第一部份 财富

  • Building Wealth 建造財富
  • Understand How Wealth Is Created 了解财富是如何创造的
  • Find and Build Specific Knowledge 查找并构建特定知识
  • Play Long-Term Games with Long-Term People 与长期的人一起玩长期游戏
  • Take on Accountability 承担责任
  • Build or Buy Equity in a Business 在企业中建立或购买股权
  • Find a Position of Leverage 找到一个有杠杆作用的位置
  • Get Paid for Your Judgment 因为你的判断而得到报酬
  • Prioritize and Focus 确定优先顺序和重点
  • Find Work That Feels Like Play 找一份感觉像是娱乐的工作
  • How to Get Lucky 如何获得幸运
  • Be Patient 要有耐心
  • Building Judgment 楼宇判断
  • Judgment 判断力
  • How to Think Clearly 如何清晰地思考
  • Shed Your Identity to See Reality 抛开你的身份去看现实
  • Learn the Skills of Decision-Making 学习决策的技巧
  • Collect Mental Models 收集心智模型
  • Learn to Love to Read 学会爱读书

第二部分：幸福

  • Learning Happiness 学习快乐
  • Happiness Is Learned 幸福是后天学来的
  • Happiness Is a Choice 幸福是一种选择
  • Happiness Requires Presence 幸福需要在场
  • Happiness Requires Peace 幸福需要和平
  • Every Desire Is a Chosen Unhappiness 每一个欲望都是一种选择的不快乐
  • Success Does Not Earn Happiness 成功不会带来幸福
  • Envy Is the Enemy of Happiness 嫉妒是幸福的敌人
  • Happiness Is Built by Habits 幸福是由习惯造就的。
  • Find Happiness in Acceptance 在接受中寻找快乐
  • Saving Yourself 拯救你自己
  • Choosing to Be Yourself 选择做你自己
  • Choosing to Care for Yourself 选择照顾自己
  • Meditation + Mental Strength 冥想+精神力量
  • Choosing to Build Yourself 选择打造自己
  • Choosing to Grow Yourself 选择成长自己
  • Choosing to Free Yourself 选择解放自己
  • Philosophy 哲理
  • The Meanings of Life 生命的意义
  • Live by Your Values 按照你的价值观生活
  • Rational Buddhism 理性佛教
  • The Present Is All We Have 现在是我们的全部
